name: Fence Guard™ Stain Concentrate Expresso
description: Fence Guard™ Stain Concentrate Expresso is the leader in wood protection and the makers of seal-once and anchorseal wood protection products. Fence Guard stain concentrate is available in four popular semi-transparent colors: Espresso, Coco Brown, Western Redwood, and Sierra Cedar. This is a water-based alkyd formula which provides penetrating oil finish but with easy water clean-up and ultra-low VOC. Fence Guard dilutes with 2 parts water to 1 part concentrate to produce a cost effective, high-quality penetrating stain for wood fences of all types. Fence Guard offers superior protection against the elements, with fade resistant high quality pigments and long-lasting water repellency.
